document_data.caption: A [[dwarf|dwarven]] merchant in the [[Sword Coast]] sells carrots at his food stand.
document_data.name: Carrot
document_data.mainbody: '''Carrots''' were a type of hardy, root vegetable found in the Realms and often used in [[stew]]s and [[salad]]s.
document_data.Description: These vegetables grew to a much larger size on [[Toril]] compared to those on [[Earth]].{{Cite dragon/277/The New Adventures of Volo: Dragonwing Stew|94}}

Availability.Beyond Faer√ªn: * Carrots were grown throughout much of [[Kara-Tur]].<ref>

document_data.Usages:
[[File:Big stiff carrot.png|thumb]]
* A whole dried carrot was required to cast the ''[[detect lycanthrope]]'' [[spell]].{{Cite dragon/130/Arcane Lore: Magic from East to West|17}} Just a bit of a dried carrot acted as a [[material component]] for the spells [[darkvision (spell)|''darkvision'']], ''[[deeper darkvision]]'', and ''[[mass darkvision]]''.
document_data.Notable Users:
* Carrots, grilled [[prawn]]s, [[bass]], and [[onion]]s on skewers were a commoners feast in Sembia and its city of [[Selgaunt]].
* [[Targos]]'s [[Trip and Shuffle]] tavern served a stew of meat, [[potato]]s and carrots in the late 15{{th}} century DR.
